articles.content: Facebook Inc on Thursday said it would remove false claims about COVID-19 vaccines that have been debunked by public health experts, following a similar announcement by Alphabet Inc’s YouTube in Octo… [+2670 chars]

articles.author: Luisa Zargani
articles.title: Gucci Donates to UNICEF USA for Equal Distribution of COVID-19 Vaccine - WWD
articles.description: Gucci is making a $500,000 donation and will match funds raised for UNICEF's work, dollar for dollar, up to an additional $100,000 through a 21-day challenge.
articles.content: MILAN — “No one is truly free unless we are all free. This also includes being free from sickness,” said Marco Bizzarri, president and chief executive officer of Gucci, who is spearheading the compan… [+3605 chars]
